name: Spike Rush (Ballance100)
description:
Make sure that your character, and an orb that follows you, don't get hit by the spikes. CONTROLS: left arrow or "a" to move left. and right arrow or "d" to move right.
CONTROLS: "esc" to exit settings menu

IMPORTANT: If the window is to big to fit on your computer screen then click settings then adjust the slider and select "Set", then press "esc" to exit settings menu
